channel.title: Dueling in a certain area!
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I'm using a devolution 7.0 server source and i am currently wonderin how to make the duel option only appear when you're in a certain area. I've experiemented in the right-click options in my client.java but to no effect. I will either get a error or when i run the server it will say stack empty and you cant log in.
All help is appreciated.
Thanx.
